scripts.build:exe: bun run embed && bun build src/index.ts --compile --outfile dist/remote-inject --minify
scripts.build:exe:linux: bun run embed && bun build src/index.ts --compile --outfile dist/remote-inject-linux --target=bun-linux-x64 --minify
scripts.build:exe:win: bun run embed && bun build src/index.ts --compile --outfile dist/remote-inject.exe --target=bun-windows-x64 --minify
scripts.test: bun run test:unit && bun run test:e2e
